potion of healing.description: This bottle contains an iridescent fluid.

sword +1.description: This sword is clearly very old, but its edge is so sharp that even touching them with your fingers leaves small, bloody cuts.  Who knows whose hands have held this sword before?

scroll of magic missile.description: This small parchment roll contains closely written script.

small quartz crystal.description: This elongated, transparent crystal has six sides and comes to a perfect point.

carved silver ring.description: This large silver ring shows a smiling face with two small, green gems for eyes.
